title: talkoncrypto Official
author: talkoncrypto Official
created_time: November 02, 2022, 09:41:51 AMLast edit: November 02, 2022, 01:50:01 PM by talkoncrypto Official
content: Hello Guys, Looking for a good , catchy and easy to recollect , domain name for a crypto exchange, which would be available to purchase , The shortlisted name would be given $30 worth of bitcoins .. Suggest as many names you can ...Would be more than happy to announce the shortlisted name here ... Any other query please feel free to ask ... Though $30 might be a small gesture as a token for your effort, but just think it may be a brain stormer for you to come up with something to think out of the box .. uniqueness prevails..

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: Probably not the answer you want — but probably don't overthink the domain name that much for now. Running an exchange successfully is hard enough in this overly saturated market. Having a great domain is great, but it's only a minor factor in the grand scheme of things.Also take note that if you actually make it successfully in the end, you could just rebrand or change domains to a better one.

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: Quote from: mk4 on November 02, 2022, 10:16:36 AMAlso take note that if you actually make it successfully in the end, you could just rebrand or change domains to a better one.Plus, any name can fit. It doesn't have to have crypto, bitcoin, coin, chain, exchange and such in it. Just look as Binance. Just look at Gemini! OP can brand whatever he likes as long as he finds a domain for it.However, I've looked up one that's free and OP can use as example for combining known words, if he doesn't have any better idea:Code:knight-exchange.com

comments.author: talkoncrypto Official
comments.body: Quote from: ETFbitcoin on November 02, 2022, 11:09:35 AMQuote from: talkoncrypto Official on November 02, 2022, 09:41:51 AMSuggest as many names you can ...As many names as you can? You might as well as visit one of brand new generator from google search result. I did quick test and those website show fairly good result,https://namelix.com/https://www.brandroot.com/https://namechk.com/brand-name-generator/Here's an example using keyword "crypto exchange"Source: https://www.brandroot.com/names?keyword=crypto+exchangeThanks for suggesting ... will surely get back to you if any of the name is selected ...

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: Quote from: NeuroticFish on November 02, 2022, 10:26:35 AMPlus, any name can fit. It doesn't have to have crypto, bitcoin, coin, chain, exchange and such in it. Just look as Binance. Just look at Gemini! OP can brand whatever he likes as long as he finds a domain for it.However, I've looked up one that's free and OP can use as example for combining known words, if he doesn't have any better idea:Code:knight-exchange.comAgree on everything, just that I personally wouldn't recommend a domain with a dash(-) as much as possible. With that example, something like knightex.com or knightexchange.com would be far better options.

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: This should be a closed contest. And for this contest to be taken seriously then engage escrow to hold the $30 prize and make a statement that you're not holding a similar contest elsewhere. Also, move this thread to the service board.

comments.author: talkoncrypto Official
comments.body: Quote from: rat03gopoh on November 02, 2022, 01:00:23 PMThis should be a closed contest. And for this contest to be taken seriously then engage escrow to hold the $30 prize and make a statement that you're not holding a similar contest elsewhere. Also, move this thread to the service board.sir , do not worry about the prize money, and i have not been running this contest anywhere else.. you have to trust me on this... i even said whosoever domain will be chosen i will declare the name here.. its a legit request that i have posted for a genuine domain name...

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Personally, I started leaning towards the OKX model or any name made up of easy-to-remember letters so you can tryFrom B to C, a unique name with simple letters, or keywords and other basics that can be remembered easily.BTWOC is good for me or any other few letters domain.

comments.author: talkoncrypto Official
comments.body: Quote from: hugeblack on November 02, 2022, 02:40:56 PMPersonally, I started leaning towards the OKX model or any name made up of easy-to-remember letters so you can tryFrom B to C, a unique name with simple letters, or keywords and other basics that can be remembered easily.BTWOC is good for me or any other few letters domain.Thanks for your suggestion, in any case does BTWOC  , does it mean something or being abbreviated ...

comments.author: cabron
comments.body: Here's one that will surely be remembered once heard by anyone. CREEPEXCHANGE.com It fits a crypto exchange domain and it's also not registered yet. That's something you would want to grab including the rest of the domain extensions like creep.exchangeJust don't list scam tokens in it for may live up to its name.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: first, I don't know how good it is to publicly ask for suggestions for a brand name or to register a "good" domain. even if I happened to come across a very good slogan with a free domain, it's possible that I would register it for myself or even someone would grab it before your act. but let's ignore that.you should have some idea in which direction you want the name of your future business to go. I conclude from your request that the name must be related to Crypto and Exchange. now it is very hard to find it and it is free to use.you've already got a suggestion to look for something completely new. binance, celsius, huobi etc... until their appearance, these words were not synonymous with crypto or exchange. I would think in that direction.I would also like it to be one word and up to a maximum of 10 characters (less is better).As ETFbitcoin suggest business name generators, I would suggest a similar tool, which will immediately check your domain available for your chosen name.businessnamegenerator.comFor example "cryptoadil" where is cryptoadil.com available to register

comments.author: batang_bitcoin
comments.body: I'm not good at it but just like the above post, there are several business name generators that would give the participants some idea. Aside from the given one, shopify has it too:https://www.shopify.com/tools/business-name-generatorSo just wishing you all luck and so as OP but I'd like to give it a try, here's my entry: starx, tracks.

comments.author: libert19
comments.body: SoberEx.net The only sober crypto exchange

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: teramit on November 12, 2022, 03:46:33 AMtitanicex.com  This one is available for only $9.58 but it may not be soon and, so are the domains posted here, because there is a thing called domain flipping where domain flippers are acquiring domains that is synonymous with a niche, if they find this thread they may beat you to it, so why not ask participants to just PM their chosen domain and only announce by posting the screenshot after you posted the winner.

comments.author: talkoncrypto Official
comments.body: Quote from: robelneo on November 17, 2022, 08:12:07 AMQuote from: teramit on November 12, 2022, 03:46:33 AMtitanicex.com  This one is available for only $9.58 but it may not be soon and, so are the domains posted here, because there is a thing called domain flipping where domain flippers are acquiring domains that is synonymous with a niche, if they find this thread they may beat you to it, so why not ask participants to just PM their chosen domain and only announce by posting the screenshot after you posted the winner.Absolutely right , but we will only be sharing the domain details once we have much to choose and after domain is purchased ... It would be here and real only ... but since we did not get much options and rather what we received uptil now are good , but somehow did not get clicked according to our needs...

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: If its a domain name only and you are not particular on extension there are many available to choose from this is one example where I use the word trade crypto which is very similar to Crypto exchange and search on NameCheap for available extensions and this is what I got
